trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sterling
There were no other sightings in Sterling on or around October 31st 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about an hour before dark, and my husband and I were on our porch having a cigarette. We were looking up at the sky as some geese flew by. My husband was the first one to notice, and he pointed it out to me. We both watched as a vertical line of three or four faint, yellowish lights moved steadily across the sky in a straight path. The lights were very small and seemed to glimmer, not blink, and they seemed to be at least as high as a jet would fly. After three to five minutes, the lights just faded away. We stood looking for another ten minutes trying to find them again, but they were gone. The only thing I remember feeling was puzzlement. I've never seen anything at all like what we saw today.
Summary: Vertical line of 3-4 faint, glimmery lights
